statements: SELECT client_id, premium_amount, coverage_amount FROM liability_insurance_rates;
SELECT policy_id, claim_status FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_rates ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, policy_id, coverage_amount FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE claim_status = 'active';
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE premium_amount < 1000;
SELECT client_id, policy_id, premium_amount FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE claim_status = 'Active' ORDER BY premium_amount DESC, policy_start_date
SELECT policy_id, coverage_amount, claim_status FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE coverage_amount > 5000 ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND coverage_amount < 10000 ORDER BY policy_start_date, coverage_amount
SELECT client_id, SUM(coverage_amount) AS total_coverage FROM liability_insurance_rates GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_coverage > 20000
SELECT DISTINCT claim_status FROM liability_insurance_rates ORDER BY claim_status ASC
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_rates;
SELECT rate, effective_date FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE insurance_provider_id = 1;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_rates ORDER BY rate DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_name LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE insurance_provider_id = 1 ORDER BY rate DESC
SELECT id, rate, effective_date FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE rate > 0.5 AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT insurance_provider_id, AVG(rate) AS average_rate FROM liability_insurance_rates GROUP BY insurance_provider_id
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY trend_end_date ASC
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_rates;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM liability_insurance_rates;
SELECT policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM liability_insurance_rates ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE impact_on_rates > 0.5;
SELECT trend_date, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, coverage_amount FROM liability_insurance_rates;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT policy_id, trend_description, impact_on_rates FROM liability_insurance_rates JOIN rate_adjustments ON liability_insurance_rates.policy_id = rate_adjustments.policy_id JOIN market_trends ON rate_adjustments.trend_id = market_trends.trend_id;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_end_date FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM rate_adjustments ORDER BY adjustment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_rates;
SELECT insurance_company, coverage_type, rate FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE coverage_type = 'General Liability';
SELECT DISTINCT insurance_company FROM liability_insurance_rates ORDER BY insurance_company DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_id, adjustment FROM adjustments WHERE adjustment > 100 ORDER BY adjustment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_rates ORDER BY insurance_company DESC;
SELECT id, coverage_type, rate FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE coverage_type = 'General Liability';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(trend_description) > 50;
SELECT AVG(rate) AS average_rate, AVG(adjustment) AS average_adjustment FROM liability_insurance_rates JOIN adjustments ON liability_insurance_rates.id = adjustments.data_id;
SELECT analysis_date, rate FROM analysis_data WHERE rate > 500 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_rates ORDER BY company_name ASC
SELECT company_name, rate FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE coverage_type = 'General Liability'
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT trend_name, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT user_name, feedback_date, feedback_details FROM user_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_rates WHERE company_name = 'ABC Insurance' AND coverage_type = 'General Liability'
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_start_date DESC
SELECT id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM analysis_data WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT adjustment_date, adjustment_details FROM adjustment_history WHERE adjustment_reason LIKE '%rate change%'
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND user_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
